message.content:
{"id": "11863", 
"title": "Bug 11863: Update Test Suite action does not allow to remove", 
"description": "", 
"OB": "When I perform the 'Update Test Suite' action, it is not clear that if I only select 'Y' in the dialog, 'X' will be removed from the test suite.", 
"EB": "The 'Update Test Suite' action should clearly indicate that selecting 'Y' in the dialog will result in the removal of 'X' from the test suite.", 
"SR": "Improve the 'Update Test Suite' action to provide a warning or confirmation to the user before removing 'X' from the test suite."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '11863', 'title': 'Bug 11863Update Test Suite action does not allow to remove', 'description': '', 'OB': "Bug 11863Update Test Suite action does not allow to remove It is no clear that if I onlyselect Y in the dialog that I'll end up with X being removed. ", 'EB': '', 'SR': 'What the action actually does is RECREATE the test suite based on the selectionin the dialog.I do an update on a test suite which contains X. '}
